duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement sales strategies to increase funnel and close new business.
Track emerging blockchain trends within M&E companies and source prospects to meet revenue projections.
Ability to analyze and act on data to identify sales segments that provide the most long term value for MOLTEN.
A customer focused approach to sales with new and existing customers.
Act as an internal advocate for customers to recommend new products and features to meet their needs and increase their profitability.
Has a thorough understanding of the emerging blockchain trends in the media industry and a deep set of contacts.
Experience in drafting and negotiating complex partnership agreements with global partners.
Results driven, team oriented and can thrive in a startup environment.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Track record of exceeding individual sales goals in a fast paced startup environment.
Comfortable with data and the impact it has on the sales process.
Take ownership of work, collaborate with teammates to leverage their complementary skill sets.
Demonstrated ability to put things in perspective, prioritize workload, and deliver results.
Build strong relationships and act on data to identify the most long term value for MOLTEN.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
